name: Sunil Pottumuttu
body:
### Professional Summary
* 11+ Years of IT industry Experience

### Certifications
* CERTIFIED ETHICAL HACKING VERSION 6

### Functional Experience 
* Mortgage Banking 
* Leasing
* Document Management Systems
* Content management Systems
* Travel Management Systems

### Technical Experience 
* Identifying and Automating Processes with Various technologies.
* Web Application development using .NET Technologies (C#4.0,ASP.NET4.0,AJAX, WCF, Restful Web Services, Linq, NHibernate SQL server 2005,Mono framework)
* Developing Projects with Open source technologies like Python, Perl, Ruby, Iron python, Mono, and Apache. 
* Performing Application security Testing and Identification of Risks.
* Writing HTTP Bots with C# and Python
* Building Custom Frameworks using .NET (Created .NET Applets)

###  Recognitions
* Recognized by Iron Python community for my contribution in identifying the bugs to the Iron Python project. (http://ironpython.codeplex.com)

###  Defects Submitted for Iron Python Project

* [http://ironpython.codeplex.com/workitem/1717](http://ironpython.codeplex.com/workitem/1717)
* http://ironpython.codeplex.com/workitem/1217
* http://ironpython.codeplex.com/workitem/449
* http://ironpython.codeplex.com/workitem/19536
* http://ironpython.codeplex.com/workitem/2912

###  Open Source projects Developed/In progress
* Iron Server http://ironserver.codeplex.com OR
* https://github.com/ironpython2001/IronServer
* IBAN Check Service http://nodejsibancheck.codeplex.com/
* Mock Service Server https://github.com/ironpython2001/MockServicesServer
* Sharp REPL https://github.com/ironpython2001/SharpREPL
* Dynamic Model Services https://github.com/ironpython2001/DynamicModelServices
* PyMockOS https://github.com/ironpython2001/PyMockOS
